title.rendered: Vibradox Plus Shilajit Syrup 500ML Boost Performance, Endurance, stamina, Strength

content.rendered:
• Vibradox Plus Syrup is specially designed to provide sustained energy and increase stamina, supporting an active lifestyle. This unique formula promotes natural rejuvenation and overall well-being, helping one maintain vitality throughout the day.
  • Made from 100% pure herbal ingredients, this syrup offers a natural and Ayurvedic approach to health. It comes in a flavored syrup form, making it easy and enjoyable to incorporate into your daily routine. The liquid herbal extract ensures quick absorption for faster and more effective results.
  • Specifically crafted as an Ayurvedic health formula, Vibradox Plus Syrup is a powerful and convenient way to enhance energy levels and vitality.

Key Benefits:

  • Helps improve energy levels
  • Enhances vitality and stamina
    Made with natural aphrodisiac herbs for overall wellness.
  • This supplement reduces the stress hormone cortisol and increases the happy hormone dopamine and may help regulate weight management.
  • Fulvic acid is a primary compound in Shilajit that may help slower the signs of skin aging.
Direction of use: Take 15 ml twice daily, before breakfast and before dinner.
Ingredients: Ashwagandha, Sated Musli, Krounchbee, Shilajit, Guduchi, Gokshur, Vidarikanda, Water.
Legal Disclaimer: This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.
